title: Check the signs
text: To assess if a reaction is spontaneous, consider the sign of the Gibbs free energy change (∆G°). What does a positive ∆G° indicate about spontaneity?

title: Review the relationship
text: Remember the relationship: If ∆G° is positive, the reaction is non-spontaneous under standard conditions. If it is negative, the reaction is spontaneous. Given that ∆G° $$=$$ $$110.5$$ $$\frac{kJ}{mol}$$ for this reaction, what does this mean?

title: Final Decision
text: Based on the values and relationship with Gibbs free energy, decide if the reaction is spontaneous at 298K.
